md:
giải nghĩa từ "parenting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Parenting (noun)

* Meaning: The process of raising and caring for children from birth to adulthood.
* Vietnamese translation: Nuôi dưỡng và chăm sóc trẻ em từ khi sinh đến khi trưởng thành.
* Part of speech: Noun
* Example sentence: "Parenting is a challenging but rewarding job that requires patience, love, and dedication."
* Related words: Parent, child, family, upbringing, nurture.
* Antonyms: Neglect, abandonment.

Note: The word "parenting" can also refer to the style or method of raising children, as in "authoritarian parenting" or "permissive parenting".

Parenting (noun)

  • Meaning: The process of raising and caring for children from birth to adulthood.
  • Vietnamese translation: Nuôi dưỡng và chăm sóc trẻ em từ khi sinh đến khi trưởng thành.
  • Part of speech: Noun
  • Example sentence: "Parenting is a challenging but rewarding job that requires patience, love, and dedication."
  • Related words: Parent, child, family, upbringing, nurture.

Note: The word "parenting" can also refer to the style or method of raising children, as in "authoritarian parenting" or "permissive parenting".
